commit message:
now version 0.7.
Fix moving vaults functions
Add additional info for vaults locations and vault size
Change stored root location (in config) to full path instead of sub-path of default storage
what's that under the util folder...???
move LICENSE and README back where they should be
Add Readmes for easier understanding of the file structure
fix bug file deleted too instantly, wait 10 sec
Fix missing contentintent, which crashes 2.3.X devices
Use FileUtils functions to prevent delete problems
delete v11 themes.... only causes force closes
Apply purge function to file deletion
destroy fileobserver at start of app/click notif
Wrongly changed one of File.delete() function
to cater for failed vault creation
Change analytics software from flurry to crashlytics
Change analytics software from flurry to crashlytics
Separate file loading and vault initialization to enhance performance
catch more exceptions in FileUtils actions to prevent errors.
Better handling of deletion queues, fix unable to delete files
More check to ensure add file intents are not empty.
Better logging by sending to crashlytics

Enhance file adding experience:
- Files from other apps will show real filename
- Better support of thumbnails
- Prevent out of memory issue in thumbnail generation

Enhance list view loading by:
- using empty views
- Using async loading of adapter data
- Use optimization with viewHolder
- Change from BaseAdapter to ArrayAdapter for better optimization

Combine fileList and fileGallery!
- More unified experience
- No duplicate code
:DDD
Use FileObserver to update UI in case of File changes
Fix donate message appearing multiple times
fix getresource crash if not attached
Fix adapter out of bound issue
add checks to prevent fragment not attached.
Prevention of null pointer error when decrypting and saving
Ensure file is in file list before trying to decrypt
Add option to disable stealth mode
Handle gallery out of memory gracefully.

Enhance controlling of onPause statements to re-lock vaults when sent to background
https://secrecy.uservoice.com/forums/263182-general/suggestions/6360872-re-lock-vaults-if-secrecy-is-sent-to-the-backgroun

fix if vault location has files

Fix crashes if activity context is destroyed, use application context instead.
Add long click to rename vault tutorial
Fill thumbnail to entire circle, no border left.
DecryptFileProvider class No longer in use

Fix change vault location unable to select alternative root
http://forum.xda-developers.com/showpost.php?s=76b301eb2512e99770791fbba7c1a916&p=55175696&postcount=139
Enhance file deletion and shredding function
Try to fix 'Unable to stop service com.doplgangr.secrecy.FileSystem.FileObserver: java.util.ConcurrentModificationException'
Prevent illegal state exception using app context
Add EventBus and Priority Queue as library
Move all background jobs to jobManager
Enhance fileList with sorting and escaping for null mime
Add Observer that was missing from last commits
Alert users for successful adding file.

Change add file basis from intent to uri,
use job also in import activity
Update lists of vaults and files to match newest UI requirement
Fine adjustment to Material style margin
prevent file null / file.getname null problems

Update Translations:
Ar, De, Es, Fr, It, Nl, Pt-BR, Ru, Tr, Zh-CN, Zh-TW
remove swipe function, move it back into filelist
Ditch uservoice SDK in favor of webURI
Enhance loading photos in gallery, prevents OOM and better bitmap recycling
Custom implementation of action mode because original one does not work well in JellyBean
Reduce order of Delete --- functions seldom used should be in overflow instead
Fully implement Navigation Drawer -- add Android L navigation menu icon

version up to 40,
add update function that changes non-obfuscated files to obfuscated.
fix wrong fragment order in mainActivity
set Import page title on new layout
fix disappeared empty view in vaults list
Refresh vault list if vault is deleted
let users add vault during import mode
